channel.title: Cant Post Serv!
channel.description:
i hav been playing mopar for a long time now (owner of a server and so on...) and iv been posting my serv on serverstatus once a day in some MONTHS now..But last week i tryed to post it, and it said "you can only post once server, sorry." and from last weeks it have been saying that all days!!! i cant get it on serverstatus again =( it did work before, and now suddenly that..and yeh notice, I DIDNT POST ANOTHER SERVER ON SERVERSTATUS!
and ive been having OVER 70+ players playing my server at ONE TIME so Dont say "did u portforward" r anything stupid as that..the last day i had to ask my friend if he could post it..and its annoying ME AND HIM..wo if any1 of you could help me maybe? if you know how i fix the problem?
THANKS! :|

item.title: Cant Post Serv!
item.dc:creator: @Santa_Is_Emo Santa Is Emo
item.description:
@Santa_Is_Emo wrote:

i hav been playing mopar for a long time now (owner of a server and so on…) and iv been posting my serv on serverstatus once a day in some MONTHS now…But last week i tryed to post it, and it said “you can only post once server, sorry.” and from last weeks it have been saying that all days!!! i cant get it on serverstatus again =( it did work before, and now suddenly that…and yeh notice, I DIDNT POST ANOTHER SERVER ON SERVERSTATUS!

and ive been having OVER 70+ players playing my server at ONE TIME so Dont say “did u portforward” r anything stupid as that…the last day i had to ask my friend if he could post it…and its annoying ME AND HIM…wo if any1 of you could help me maybe? if you know how i fix the problem?

THANKS!
